data.title: Recent Mergers and Acquisitions: The Premier Technology M&A Practice in The Nation
data.meta_description: M&A_List - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document summarizes selected mergers and acquisitions that took place in 2010 and 2009. In 2010, there were 53 acquisitions valued in excess of $5 billion. Some notable acquisitions included Cisco acquiring ScanSafe for $183 million, Symantec acquiring PGP Corporation for $306 million, and SonoSite acquiring Visualsonics for $71 million. In 2009, there were 52 acquisitions valued in excess of $17 billion, including Amazon acquiring Zappos.com for $847 million and EMC acquiring Data Domain for $2.4 billion.
data.text: Recent Mergers and Acquisitions: The Premier Technology M&A Practice in The Nation
